name: Glow Moisturizer
description: The perfect all natural facial moisturizer. Made with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil and Pure Vitamin E. Light and creamy. Designed to keep your face hydrated, but not oily. Dries powdery soft. Great for the summer's humidity and the winter's harshness. Year long indulgence!

name: Goji Berry Chocolate Mud Mask
description: Chocolate is no longer just for dessert! Allow the natural antioxidants found in natural cacao, bentonite clay and the goji berry to detoxify your skin and increase circulation, causing that natural glow of health! The Goji Chocolate Mud Mask is great for healing acne and breakouts, exfoliation and overall pampering of your skin. Spoil yourself!

name: Creamy Souffle' Leave-In
description: This creamy conditioning shampoo is so gentle that you can wash your hair with it everyday. The creamy feel and the scents of calming essential oils like lavender and chamomile are soothing and moisturizing. Use a palm full, thoroughly massage it into your hair and scalp, let sit for 2 - 4 minutes and then rinse in cool water. You may repeat if necessary. Remember, it will not suds because at Runway Ready we say "NO" to SLS! Perfect for the person on the go since your hair will hold to the moisture it needs from the shampoo. No extra conditioning needed. Also great for those with fine hair since the moisturizers will not weigh your hair down. You may also use this as a leave in conditioner.

name: Brown Sugar Scrub Clarifying Shampoo
description: A great deep cleansing, clarifying shampoo. Excellent for removing dandruff and build up. Works perfectly with The Deep Conditioner as a full cleansing and conditioning partnership. Let the fine brown sugar crystals and aloe gently scrub, soothe and cleanse your scalp, while essential oils infuse moisture into your hair shaft and encourage growth. The ginger and vanilla scent will enhance your experience, as a burst of citrus invigorate your scalp!

name: The Deep Conditioner
description: The best of all of that nature has to offer! This deep conditioner is the flagship product of Runway Ready, Inc. The Shea Butter and Coconut Oil blends together with natural herbs and essential oils to create the perfect marriage of moisturizing and conditioning for your hair. This conditioner is so pure and unadulterated that a quarter size amount will do for one treatment, even on thick hair. If there is one conditioner that you deserve, this is it. Let your scalp tingle and your hair shine. Works great with the Brown Sugar Scrub Shampoo!

name: The Face Set
description: The full sized set of our facial skin care line. Includes an 8 oz. Toner, 4 oz. Glow Moisturizer and 2 oz. Goji Berry Chocolate Mud Mask. This makes a perfect gift for yourself or a loved one!

name: The Hair Set
description: The full size set for all of your hair care needs. Includes an 8 oz. Brown Sugar Scrub Clarifying Shampoo, 8 oz. Creamy Souffle', 8 oz. Deep Conditioner, and a 4 oz. Shine hair moisturizing spray. Perfect for all of your hair maintenance and styling needs!

name: The Toner
description: Perfect for shrinking and closing pores, evening skin tone and discouraging acne and skin irritation. Refreshing and invigorating, this toner will brighten your day while allowing your face to radiate with a natural healthy glow.
